isis.stitle: HOOD, GRILLE, FENDERS AND BUMPER - 8600 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - FENDERS

svcprocinfo.para: The 8600 Series fender assemblies ( Figure 35) are a bonded component of the hood section, including the wheel well opening " valance", headlight housing, and front cross bar cover. The grille, grille shroud and headlight assemblies are the only major removable components of the front hood assembly.

calloutgroup.callout1: 6. CROSS BAR COVER ON LOWER GRILLE MOUNT

svcsubproc.title: Headlight - Removal
svcsubproc.para: To remove the headlight assembly ( Figure 36) refer to the procedure for removing and installing the grille and shroud. The grille and shroud must be removed prior to removing the headlight assembly.

calloutgroup.callout1: 3. AMBER CLEARANCE AND SIDE DIRECTIONAL BULB

step1.para: Tilt the hood assembly forward, disconnect the headlight and clearance light harness.
Loosen and remove the three (3) headlight assembly mounting nuts from the headlight assembly mounting studs on the rear of the headlight housing.
Tilt hood to original position. Loosen and remove the headlight assembly mounting bolt from the fender assembly mounting hole).
Remove headlight assembly.
To remove the opposite side headlight assembly follow the procedures as listed above.

specpara.para: Headlight adjustment is addressed in ADJUSTMENTS section.

svcsubproc.title: Headlight Install
svcsubproc.para: The grille and shroud assembly should have been previously removed.

step1.para: Insert the headlight assembly into the headlight housing opening ( Figure 39, Item 1), aligning the mounting studs ( Figure 37, Items 3, 5, 7 and 9) with the mounting holes in the headlight housing.
Insert the headlight assembly mounting bolt ( Figure 38, Item 2) into the headlight mounting tab and headlight assembly bolt hole.

figure.caption: Figure 39. Headlight Assembly Remove and Install

step1.para: Tilt the hood forward.
Install the headlight assembly mounting nuts on the mounting studs located on the rear of the headlight housing. Tighten nuts to torque value on torque chart.
Insert the lower headlight assembly mounting screws through mounting holes in the valance assembly and tighten.
Tighten the housing stud nuts to 11 to 13 lbf-ft (14.8 to 18.1 Nm).
Tighten the headlight mounting assembly bolts to 34 to 38 lbf-ft (46 to 51 Nm).
Reconnect the head light harness into the chassis harness located above the frame rail section at the opening below the vertical hood support bracket.
Tilt the hood back and secure the hood latches.
Re-install shroud and grille assembly.

svcsubproc.title: Hood Latches, Upper and Lower Assembly
svcsubproc.para: The hood latching mechanism consists of two assemblies: the upper hood / fender assembly latch clip ( Figure 41, Item 2) and the lower fender extension lock ( Figure 41, Item 1).

calloutgroup.callout1: 2. HOOD LATCH AND FENDER CLIP MOUNTING BOLTS
3. LOWER FENDER EXTENSION LATCH LOCK DOWN ASSEMBLY

figure.caption: Figure 41. Upper Hood / Fender Latch Attachment - Driver Side Shown

svcsubproc.para: The upper hood/fender latch attachment assembly is located at the rear section of the fender assembly ( Figure 41, Item 2). The latching assembly is attached to the fender extension. This part swings up and latches on the upper catch assembly and secures the hood in position. To remove the latch assembly:

step1.para: Release the latching mechanism both sides of the hood and tilt hood forward.
Loosen and remove the hood clip mounting bolts, washers and lock nuts ( Figure 40, Items , 2 and 6) and remove the clip assembly ( Figure 40, Item 1) from the fender assembly.
Locate, loosen and remove the mounting bolts, washers and lock nuts ( Figure 40, Items 2 and 6) securing the fender extension latch mechanism ( Figure 40, Item 3).
Follow same procedure for removal of opposite side.

svcsubproc.title: Upper and Lower Hood Latch - Install
svcsubproc.para: Release the latching mechanism both sides of hood and tilt hood forward.

step1.para: Position the upper clip assembly with the mounting holes in the fender section. Align the mounting holes of the latch assembly with the mounting holes in the fender assembly.
Insert the mounting bolt through the clip assembly and fender section. Install the flat washer and lock nut on the inside of the fender section and tighten.
Tighten upper latch assembly to 34 to 38 lbf-ft (46 to 51 Nm).
Place the lower latch mechanism ( Figure 42, Item 2) on the fender extension, align the mounting holes.
Insert the mounting bolts through the latching assembly and fender extension.
Install the flat washer and luck nuts on the mounting bolts and tighten.

figure.caption: Figure 42. Hood Latching Mechanism (Driver Side Shown)

calloutgroup.callout1: 4. CAB STUD FENDER EXTENSION MOUNTING HOLE

step1.para: Follow same procedure for installation on opposite side.
Tighten lower mounting bolts to 34 to 38 lbf-ft (46 to 51 Nm).
Lower hood and latch both sides of the hood.
